Title: Provides that in New York city, the rent following the dissolution date shall be the last rent authorized for the affected dwelling
Summary: Provides that in cities with a population of one million or more, the rent following the dissolution date of Mitchell-Lama developments shall be the last rent authorized for the affected dwelling.
LawCode: Add ยง35-b, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to limited profit housing companies in a city with a population of one million or more
